Anime: A selection of favourite anime openings. Includes some popular tracks as well as a few more obscure offerings.
Indie: Some well known songs mixed in with hidden gems from a range of indie / alternative bands.
Video Games: A collection of tracks that help define the games they're a part of.
Easy: Hear a 10 second long clip and make your choice!
Hard: Kick things up a notch! This time the clip is only five seconds long. Do your best!
Challenge: See how many you can get right.
Sudden Death: Just one life, don't take any chances!
